snippet.title: Disassembly 3D: New Weapons Update Trailer 2019
snippet.description:
Disassembly 3D: Ultimate Stereoscopic Destruction simulates the experience of taking everyday objects apart. Remove screws, bolts, nuts and every single part with your tools and bare hands. All fully interactive with realistic disassembly physics! Weapons mode unlock as you complete levels for more destructive fun!

Get it now!

App Store Link:
http://itunes.apple.com/app/disassembly-3d-ultimate-stereoscopic/id462604666?mt=8
Google Play Link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kch.Disassembly3D
Amazon Link:
http://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/dl/android?p=com.kch.Disassembly3D
Steam Link:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/747910
Windows Store Link:
http://apps.microsoft.com/windows/app/disassembly/f6172b07-291a-41cb-b352-a88483a70c02
Mac App Store Link:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/disassembly-3d-ultimate-stereoscopic/id1136720198?ls=1&mt=12
